**Summon Ice Beast** is a level 3 [Ice](/Ice_Magic "Ice Magic")/[Summoning](/Summonings "Summonings") spell which summons an [ice beast](/Ice_beast "Ice beast") to attack your foes.

[Ice Elementalists](/Ice_Elementalist "Ice Elementalist") start with this spell in their spell library.

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 Monster Version](#Monster_Version)
- [4 History](#History)
- [5 References](#References)

## Useful Info

A single [ice beast](/Ice_beast "Ice beast") is summoned.

Higher [spell power](/Spell_power "Spell power") increases the ice beast's [HD](/HD "HD"), which increases HP, accuracy, and the strength of the freezing attack. Ice beast HD equals `3 + <power> / 13`, randomly rounded.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

Duration of the summon is around 27 turns; it does not depend on spellpower.

There is a summon cap of 1 ice beast; casting the spell again will cause the old summon to very quickly time out.

## Strategy

Ice Beasts are effective for the early- and mid- game, with decent stats overall. Their [cold](/Cold "Cold") attacks work great in [the Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair"); since many Lair enemies are [cold-blooded](/Cold-blooded "Cold-blooded"), ice beasts have a chance to [slow](/Slow "Slow") them. As bonuses, ice beasts are naturally [rPois](/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"), and do not trigger the bloodzerk of [skysharks](/Skyshark "Skyshark").

For Ice Magic users, it's an easily available summon, valuable because it is a summon (MP-efficient, takes hits, blocks line of fire). For Summonings users, it's another summon, allowing them to have more allies out at once.

## Monster Version

The monster version of the spell creates standard ice beasts without altered hit dice. The summon also has longer duration, around 81 turns.

The following enemies cast Summon Ice Beast:

- e [![Fannar.png](/images/4/49/Fannar.png)](/File:Fannar.png) **[Fannar](/Fannar "Fannar")**
- 8 [![Ice statue.png](/images/4/49/Ice_statue.png)](/File:Ice_statue.png) **[Ice statue](/Ice_statue "Ice statue")**

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), this spell was a level 4 Ice/Summoning spell. Also, the summon's [duration class](/Duration_class "Duration class") depended on power, ranging from 2 (around 18 turns) to 4 (around 36 turns). The formula was `2 + (1d<power> - 1) / 4` (capped at 4).
- In [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), Ice Elementalists start with this spell again.
- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), this spell had a summon cap of three.
- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), [Ice Elementalists](/Ice_Elementalist "Ice Elementalist") and [Summoners](/Summoner "Summoner") started with this spell.
- Prior to [0.9](/0.9 "0.9"), this spell was level 5.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [spl-summoning.cc:208](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.28.0/crawl-ref/source/spl-summoning.cc#L208) (0.28.0)
